summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Blueview2 glassmorphism UI transformation. All core functionality working with beautiful futuristic design implementation.

ui_bugs.issue: Floating navigation sometimes intercepts pointer events, making buttons behind it difficult to click

design_issues.issue: Logout button not easily visible or accessible in header

passed_tests: Dashboard user name display in extralight font
Stats cards with nested glass design (24 Workers, 5 Projects, 18 On-Site)
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Projects, Workers, Daily Log, Reports)
Add project modal opens and accepts input
Workers page date selector with TODAY indicator
ON-SITE and DONE status indicators display
Daily Log page project selector and weather picker
Animated background with grid overlay and floating orbs
Consistent glassmorphism design across all pages
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix floating navigation z-index/pointer-events issue to prevent button click interception. Consider making logout button more prominent in header.
